text:
The Scarecrow or Dr. Jonathan Crane is a fictional Batman supervillain who appears in American comic books published by DC Comics. He uses fear gas to scare his victims and even Batman. He used to be a psychologist who used his patients as test for his fear gases or fear drugs. He wears a scarecrow mask and a scarecrow costume.
Portrayals.
He was played by Cillian Murphy in "Batman Begins", "The Dark Knight", and in "The Dark Knight Rises".
